Headline: #54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd Temporary Southbound Reroute near Old Orchard Rd/Lavergne
ShortDescription: SB 54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd buses temp. rerouted via Old Orchard, Skokie Blvd, Golf, Lavergne (enter Mall at back entrance), near Old Orchard Rd/Lavergne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd buses are temporarily rerouted via Old Orchard, Skokie Blvd, Golf, Lavergne (enter Mall at back entrance), near Old Orchard Rd/Lavergne.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
